Module io.inverno.mod.http.client
Package io.inverno.mod.http.client

Interface Endpoint.WebSocketRequest<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends WebSocketExchange<A>,C extends InterceptableExchange<A>>

Type Parameters:
A - the exchange context type
B - the WebSocket exchange type
C - the interceptable exchange type
All Superinterfaces:
BaseRequest, HttpClient.WebSocketRequest<A,B,C>
Enclosing interface:
Endpoint
public static interface Endpoint.WebSocketRequest<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends WebSocketExchange<A>,C extends InterceptableExchange<A>> extends HttpClient.WebSocketRequest<A,B,C>

A WebSocket client request bound to an endpoint.

Since:
1.6
Author:
Jeremy Kuhn

    • authority

      Endpoint.WebSocketRequest<A,B,C> authority(String authority)
      Description copied from interface: HttpClient.WebSocketRequest

      Specifies the request authority.

      This corresponds to the authority form as defined by RFC1230 Section 5.3.3 specified in the host header or :authority psuedo-header.

      Specified by:
      authority in interface HttpClient.WebSocketRequest<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends WebSocketExchange<A>,C extends InterceptableExchange<A>>
      Parameters:
      authority - the request authority
      Returns:
      the WebSocket request

    • intercept

      Endpoint.WebSocketRequest<A,B,C> intercept(ExchangeInterceptor<A,C> interceptor)
      Description copied from interface: HttpClient.WebSocketRequest

      Specifies an interceptor to intercept the request before it is sent to the endpoint.

      When invoked multiple time this method chains the interceptors one after the other.

      Specified by:
      intercept in interface HttpClient.WebSocketRequest<A extends ExchangeContext,B extends WebSocketExchange<A>,C extends InterceptableExchange<A>>
      Parameters:
      interceptor - an exchange interceptor
      Returns:
      the WebSocket request
